name: VC Image Hover Effect oCoder Free
author: oCoder

sections.description:
Demo Here
VC Image Hover Effect oCoder Free is a free version of “Image Hover Effects for Team Member oCoder” on codecanyon. This add on will help you to create beautiful image hover effect with visual composer. We prepared many style, you only need to click and change color you want. If you think this is a good plugin, please buy pro version or donate us.
Features

Create Image Hover Effect easily
Edit Effect Style 
Many Image Effect on one page
Prepared about more than 30 Effects
Social links supported
Email link supported

How to use

Install
Create Image Hover Effect  from Visual Composer editor
Change styles
Done!!!
sections.installation:
1. Please install and active visual composer plugin
  2. Install and active this plugin. If you do not know how to install and active a wordpress plugin, please take a look here:https://www.siteground.com/tutorials/wordpress/wordpress_plugins.htm
  3. Go to your page and edit, it’s better to use visual composer Front End edit because you can see what change directly.
    If you have any question, please feel free to contact us via email trungstormsix@gmail.com
sections.faq:
1. Where to add form?
    You need to install Visual Composer and after that, you add form in Visual Composer. The addon named “Team Hover Free – oCoder” in Visual Composer
